recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir fry with seasonal vegetables.
steps: Chop vegetables of your choice.
Heat oil in a pan.
Stir fry vegetables for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken in a spiced tomato sauce, served with rice.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked.
Prepare the sauce with tomatoes and spices.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer.
Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with quinoa, cucumbers, and feta cheese.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop cucumbers and tomatoes.
Mix quinoa with vegetables and feta.
Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Flavorful beef tacos topped with fresh salsa.
steps: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Fill shells with beef and toppings.
Serve with salsa and avocado.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix butter, sugars, and vanilla.
Add eggs and mix well.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.description: A healthy breakfast layered with yogurt, fruit, and granola.
steps: Layer Greek yogurt with fresh fruit.
Add a layer of granola.
Repeat layers and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty soup made with lentils and vegetables.
steps: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery.
Add lentils and vegetable broth.
Simmer until lentils are tender.
Season and serve hot.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad made with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and berries.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter.
Cook on a griddle until bubbles form.
Serve with syrup and fresh berries.
